title: Cuento
descript: It means tale. Short story created by one or more authors, it can be based on either real or fictional events, the plot of which is carried out by a small group of characters and with a relatively simple plot.

title: Cuento
descript: It means tale. Short story created by one or more authors, it can be based on either real or fictional events, the plot of which is carried out by a small group of characters and with a relatively simple plot.

title: Novela
descript: It means novel. More or less extensive literary narrative, usually of a fictional nature, in which a series of events prolonged over time is told, in order to entertain and provide aesthetic pleasure to its readers.

title: Novela
descript: It means novel. More or less extensive literary narrative, usually of a fictional nature, in which a series of events prolonged over time is told, in order to entertain and provide aesthetic pleasure to its readers.

title: Noticias
descript: It means news. Story or writing about a current event of public interest, it is an objective text disseminated through various social media.

title: Noticias
descript: It means news. Story or writing about a current event of public interest, it is an objective text disseminated through various social media.

title: Poema
descript: It means poem. Literary genre that consists of the representation of a feeling, a story or an idea in an aesthetic way and promoting its beauty. This representation is carried out through words, whether in the form of verse or prose.

title: Poema
descript: It means poem. Literary genre that consists of the representation of a feeling, a story or an idea in an aesthetic way and promoting its beauty. This representation is carried out through words, whether in the form of verse or prose.

title: Leer
descript: It means read. An example of the use of this word is: '¡Este año voy a leer 10 libros!' = 'This year I am going to read 10 books!'

title: Leer
descript: It means read. An example of the use of this word is: '¡Este año voy a leer 10 libros!' = 'This year I am going to read 10 books!'

title: Hablar
descript: It means talk. An example of the use of this word is: 'Me encanta hablar con mis amigos' = 'I love talking with my friends'

descript: It means talk. An example of the use of this word is: 'Me encanta hablar con mis amigos' = 'I love talking with my friends'

title: Comer
descript: It means eat. An example of the use of this word is: 'Me gusta comer mucho pero me duele el estómago' = 'I like to eat a lot but my stomach hurts.'

title: Comer
descript: It means eat. An example of the use of this word is: 'Me gusta comer mucho pero me duele el estómago' = 'I like to eat a lot but my stomach hurts.'

title: Dormir
descript: It means sleep. An example of the use of this word is: 'Yo no duermo antes de ir a la escuela' = 'I don't sleep before going to school'
